ygData.subject: Anyone have the last charter David modified?
ygData.msgSnippet: I remember from previous e-mail that David added some of the RP background to the charter before final approval.  Does anyone have a copy of the final approved
ygData.messageBody:
I remember from previous e-mail that David added some of the RP background
to the charter before final approval. Does anyone have a copy of the final
approved charter?

I've had a request for a copy from an interested player on Brell. :) Not a
member of the list, I could recite the short version (from the chat and posted
here at beginning of name discission). Maybe a guild with a tag and charter
identifying the group will bring more together?

If anyone does can it be posted please?

- Lora
(hoping to get Melodie, Shiri and Lynx tagged on Brell this week)

P.S.
On the transgendered characters. My Bard Melodie(female char) was heavily
flirted
with by a female char Monk in a recent group. I *assumed* the female Monk
was male
played, but didn't ask since it really doesn't matter to me. First all the
male
chars got "very quiet" ... but when I responded without shock (yes I agree
she does
look good in leather! hehe), it quickly opened up and the male chars were
vying for
flirt lines with the female char. All light banter ... fun was had by all.
So,
we either had a transgendered char accepted, or Rping of a Bi with
(Les/Bi)/Straights
contending for her interest. The good point is it was relaxed and all
seemed to
enjoy it :) NO ONE asked either myself (or the Monk to my knowlege) what
sex the player
was :) (or what our RL orientation was). Nice to see.
